mapper.select: select business_id, applicant_code, applicant_time, business_top_type, business_name, trademark_type, business_second_type, price, proxy_money, upload_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, custom_id, remark from trademark.tbl_business where business_id = #{businessId}

select business_id, applicant_code, applicant_time, business_top_type, business_name, trademark_type, business_second_type, price, proxy_money, upload_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, custom_id, remark from trademark.tbl_business limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(*) from trademark.tbl_business
and business_name like "%"#{businessName}"%"
and create_by like "%"#{createBy}"%"
and update_by like "%"#{updateBy}"%"
and custom_id = #{customId}
select progress_type from tbl_progress where business_id = #{businessId} order by progress_id desc limit 1

select tuc.login_name, sum(tb.proxy_money) performance from (select tu.login_name, tc.custom_id from tbl_user tu left join tbl_custom tc on tu.user_id = tc.proxy_id where tu.del_flag = 0) tuc left join tbl_business tb on tuc.custom_id = tb.custom_id group by login_name;

select login_name, count(visit_id) visit_count from tbl_user tu right join (select visit_id, proxy_id, tv.create_time from tbl_visit tv left join tbl_custom tc on tv.custom_id = tc.custom_id ) tvc on tu.user_id = tvc.proxy_id where tvc.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by login_name

select month(create_time) month, count(*) visit_count from tbl_visit tv left join (select custom_id, login_name from tbl_custom tc inner join tbl_user tu on tc.proxy_id = tu.user_id) tcu on tv.custom_id = tcu.custom_id where login_name = #{loginName} group by month(create_time)

select month(tg.create_time) month ,count(tg.create_time) progressCount,td.business_id,tg.create_time,tg.progress_type,td.proxy_id,td.login_name from tbl_progress tg inner join (select business_id, tb.custom_id, proxy_id,tc.login_name from tbl_business tb right join (select tc.proxy_id,tc.custom_id,tu.login_name from tbl_custom tc inner join tbl_user tu on tc.proxy_id = tu.user_id) tc on tb.custom_id = tc.custom_id ) td on tg.business_id=td.business_id
and td.login_name like "%"#{loginName}"%"
and tg.progress_type like "%"#{progressType}"%"
group by month

select month(tg.create_time) month ,count(tg.create_time) progressCount,td.business_id,tg.create_time,tg.progress_type,td.proxy_id,td.login_name from tbl_progress tg inner join (select business_id, tb.custom_id, proxy_id,tc.login_name from tbl_business tb right join (select tc.proxy_id,tc.custom_id,tu.login_name from tbl_custom tc inner join tbl_user tu on tc.proxy_id = tu.user_id) tc on tb.custom_id = tc.custom_id ) td on tg.business_id=td.business_id
and td.login_name like "%"#{loginName}"%"
and tg.progress_type=#{progressType}
group by month
mapper.insert: insert into trademark.tbl_business(applicant_code, applicant_time, business_top_type, business_name, trademark_type, business_second_type, price, proxy_money, upload_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, custom_id, remark) values (#{applicantCode}, #{applicantTime}, #{businessTopType}, #{businessName}, #{trademarkType}, #{businessSecondType}, #{price}, #{proxyMoney}, #{uploadId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{customId}, #{remark})
